name: Pewe and Puegh
description:
A submission for the 2021 Brackeys Game Jam under the theme "Stronger Together". 

You embody the two spaceships, named Puegh and Pewe, and with your new high-tech laser toy, you've been trusted in destroying waves of enemies with the sole purpose of ensuring you cease to exist. In this arcade-Esque top-down shooter, try to get the best score, and have fun. Thanks For Playing.

You control two ships with a laser that is linked between them, use this laser to kill the onslaught of enemy ships, power up upon your journey for the highest score. 

Note: The web version of the game has broken audio, the sounds don't play when they are supposed to(Specifically, theme music and laser sound), the sound works perfectly fine in the downloadable version.
